title: Playful font ID
content:
Hello:

Since I can't insert or attach any kind of image, I choose to copy/paste a link to the font in question:

[http://www2.esmas.com/entretenimiento/telenovelas/atrevete-a-sonar/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023123915/http:/www2.esmas.com/entretenimiento/telenovelas/atrevete-a-sonar/ "http://www2.esmas.com/entretenimiento/telenovelas/atrevete-a-sonar/")

It's the one used on the main menu (Elenco Capitulos Música, etc.)

Thanks!!

Q™ says: It's all about the fonts...
author: Qdzign.com.mx
